availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jacob Hoffman (Richland County, IL, silversmith and county clerk)

body.p: Richland County, Illinois, silversmith and county clerk. Pennsylvania native. Married to Jane W. Hoffman. Father of William E. Hoffman, Susan R. Hoffman, Mary E. Hoffman, Eleanor J. Hoffman, and Rudolph L. Hoffman. Silversmith in Richland County, Illinois, in 1850. County clerk in Richland County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Illinois, Richland County, Clay and Richland, p. 161A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Illinois, Richland County, Olney, p. 33.
"Jacob Hoffman (1806-1867)," Find A Grave, Memorial 35546311, accessed March 30, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/35546311.
